text: ai meree qaum aaj to (beshak) tumhaaree baadashaahat hai (aur) mulk mein tumhaara hee bol baala hai lekin (kal) agar khuda ka azaab ham par aa jae to hamaaree kaun madad karega phiraun ne kaha main to vahee baat samajhaata hoon jo main khî€¼ud samajhata hoon aur vahee raah dikhaata hoon jisamen bhalaee hai
